glsa.title: Charybdis, ShadowIRCd: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in Charybdis and ShadowIRCd, possibly resulting in remote Denial of Service.

background.p: Charybdis is the Atheme Projectâ€™s IRC daemon based on ratbox. ShadowIRCd is an IRC daemon based on Charybdis that adds several useful features.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in Charybdis and ShadowIRCd. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
